data.sampled:
The determinant of your matrix is -27.00. Please be aware that the determinant of a 2x2 matrix can also be calculated with the following formula:
det(A) = a * d - b * c, where 
- A is your matrix
- a, b, c and d are the elements of your matrix.

In this case, a is -3, b is 4, c is 2 and 
d is 1. So, A = -3 * 1 - 4 * 2 + 2 * d = -27.00.

This technique can be very useful when you want to write code that calculates determinants very easily.
Please write me a comment so I can assist you further.

Regards,
Assistant.
